¿Por qué Impact Advocacy?

"Creamos espacios donde la dignidad se encuentra con los datos, donde el orgullo cultural se cruza con la sabiduría financiera, y donde el sueño de cada familia tiene un camino estratégico hacia adelante."

🎯

Enfoque Dirigido

Soluciones personalizadas para comunidades latinas en DFW

Hablantes nativos de español que entienden tu cultura

Our Services

Practical Solutions. Proven Results. Community Impact.

💰

Financial Literacy Training

Workshops on youth budgeting, credit repair, adult financial planning, and small business bookkeeping.

  • Youth budgeting workshops
  • Credit repair
  • Financial planning
  • Business bookkeeping
Learn More
🤝

Community Empowerment Programs

Outreach at festivals, churches, schools like Latino cultural fairs, women-in-finance panels, voter registration workshops.

  • Cultural fairs
  • Educational panels
  • Voter registration
  • Community events
Learn More
🎯

Strategic Consulting

Customized guidance for nonprofits and entrepreneurs, marketing to underserved communities, generational wealth planning.

  • Nonprofit consulting
  • Community marketing
  • Wealth planning
  • Bilingual advising
Learn More
🏠

Real Estate & Housing Guidance

Advice for renters and first-time buyers in DFW areas with local market insights for neighborhoods like Oak Cliff, Pleasant Grove, Irving.

  • First-time buyers
  • DFW market knowledge
  • Renter guidance
  • Local insights
Learn More

Meet Our Team

Experienced leaders dedicated to empowering Latino communities in DFW.

Tessie Santiago

Co-founder & President

TV personality on Univision and former Dallas Chamber President with 20+ years of community empowerment experience.

Jackie Guevara

Co-founder & Strategic Consultant

Experienced business consultant specializing in community development and sustainable growth strategies.

Emanuel Ibarra

Real Estate Specialist

DFW area real estate expert providing guidance on real estate investments and housing opportunities.
